sentences.en: Eyewitnesses spoke of rocks and shards of glass flying in the air.
sentences.cn: 目击者们提到了在空中飞舞的石子和玻璃碎片。

sentences.en: Ice Shard - Summons an Ice Revenant, lasts 180 second.
sentences.cn: IceShard寒冰碎片-召唤一只寒冰亡灵, 维持180秒.

sentences.en: It is a pleasure that misery is shard by others.
sentences.cn: 苦恼有人分担,也是一种乐趣.

sentences.en: Nakatomi conglomerate stole a shard of Akujiki, breaking the hell spawn seal.
sentences.cn: 中臣财团就是偷了恶食碎片, 然后破坏了式神的封印.

sentences.en: Objlist - Generates an html document listing all objects currently spawned on the shard?
sentences.cn: 产生网页文件列出所有目前再生物件.

trans.tran_cn: （玻璃、金属或其他硬物的）尖利的碎片
trans.tran_en: a sharp piece of broken glass, metal etc
